trans-unit.source: Hosts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> that displays items that overflow the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hosts um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> que exibe os itens de estouro de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the [ToolStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) to manage this situation.
trans-unit.target: Se houver mais itens de estouro que podem ser exibidas no formulário, use o [Editor de coleção de itens de ToolStrip](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) para gerenciar essa situação.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o controle.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se você não chamar explicitamente o método CreateAccessibilityInstance, ele será chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para o controle.

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> that can be dropped down and to which events can be attached.
trans-unit.target: Cria um vazio <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> que pode ser removido para baixo e para quais eventos podem ser anexados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaço, em pixels, que é especificado pelo padrão entre os controles.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value representing the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> valor que representa o espaçamento entre controles.

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose*> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Finalize*> methods to release the managed and unmanaged resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <> </> *> e <> </> *> métodos para liberar os recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados usados pela instância atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Finalize%2A> methods; do not call this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado somente pelo público <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Finalize%2A>métodos; não chame este método diretamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you implement the dispose pattern, the <xref:System.Boolean> parameter of the Dispose method should be used as follows: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose> method of the current object should call Dispose with the <xref:System.Boolean> parameter set to `true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Quando você implementa o padrão dispose, o <xref:System.Boolean>parâmetro do método Dispose deve ser usado da seguinte maneira: - o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose>método do objeto atual deve chamar Dispose com o <xref:System.Boolean>parâmetro definido como `true` para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados.</xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Finalize%2A> method of the current object should call Dispose with the <xref:System.Boolean> parameter set to `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Finalize%2A>método do objeto atual deve chamar Dispose com o <xref:System.Boolean>parâmetro definido como `false` para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.</xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can fit.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual um controle pode ser ajustadas.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: A área tamanho personalizado para um controle.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um par ordenado de tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a largura e altura de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"></xref> has items that overflow the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"> </xref> tem itens de estouro de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"></xref> has overflow items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"> </xref> tem itens excedentes; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnPaint method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPaint também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable automatic mirroring; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para habilitar o espelhamento automático; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho e local do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa o tamanho e local do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"> </xref>.
